doc:
John Clegg (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Clegg_(actor) 0 John Walter Lawrence Clegg (born 9 July 1934) is an Indian-born English actor best known for playing the part of 'Mr. La-di-da' Gunner Paderewski Graham in the BBC sitcom It Ain't Half Hot Mum. His first television role was DC Greaves in Dixon of Dock Green in 1961. He has most recently been seen in the film Death in Holy Orders in 2003 as the character Father John Betterton. Clegg married actress Mavis Pugh in 1959. Pugh appeared in various Croft and Perry sitcoms including Dad's Army and You Rang, M'Lord?, as well as It Ain't Half Hot Mum and Are You Being Served?. He also once had a one-man show playing Rudyard Kipling at the Edinburgh Festival Fringe. Clegg married actress_Mavis_Pugh in 1959 . Pugh appeared in various_Croft_and_Perry_sitcoms including Dad 's_Army and You Rang , M'Lord ? , as_well_as It Ai n't Half_Hot_Mum and Are You Being_Served ? . He also once had a_one-man_show playing Rudyard_Kipling at the_Edinburgh_Festival_Fringe .
